post.author: Dosson
post.body:
ok so i will edmit i use pirate version of doom and its exp, but just want to play with my friends, so the only problem from play the game along with my friends is that when ever i try to enter a mp game, it requests for me to give them a cd key, which is rejected every time i try. If anyone can help me(with a mod or any program that can help bypass it) then please i would be most apreciative (and sorry if my english isnt good, its cause im from the baltic sea).

ps: if its important so im using a fodified exe file to bypass the cd key and original cd requirement and that the doomkey and xpkey do not contain the cd keys as i guess they should. So please help me

post.author: Sikkpin
post.body: You won't get any help from anyone here with regards to pirated software. I'm now sorry I helped you out in your other thread. Go buy the game.
